alert.note: Alert for Fannin; Gilmer; Towns; Union (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 1:47PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Towns, north central Gilmer, northwestern Union and northeastern Fannin Counties through 215 PM EST... At 147 PM EST, a strong thunderstorm was over Mineral Bluff, or near Blue Ridge, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Blue Ridge, Young Harris, Morganton, Hemp, Mineral Bluff, Gumlog, Nottely Dam, Hurst, Ivy Log, Loving, Epworth and Alexanders Mill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM EST for north central Georgia. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 700 PM EST for northeastern Georgia.
